statements: DELETE FROM palm_vein_recognition_data WHERE user_id = 100 AND access_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM PalmVeinRecognitionData WHERE user_id = 100 AND scan_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM PalmVeinUsers WHERE age > 35 AND gender = 'M';
DELETE FROM palm_vein_recognition_data WHERE user_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM palm_vein_recognition_data WHERE verification_result = 'failed' AND timestamp < '2021-09-01';
DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE age < 18 AND gender = 'Female';
